synthesis_conditions.washing_method: repeatedly washed with methanol at 50 8C and decanted
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: PXRD data were collected at the Advanced Photon Source (APS) on beam line 12BM (l = 0.61992 G). SC-XRD data were collected on a Bruker-Nonius FR591 Kappa APEX II equipped with Oxford Cryosystems nitrogen cryostreams and graphite monochromated MoKa radiation (l = 0.71073 G) from a rotating anode.
